lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: [type:interjection, eng:Hello, jpn:こんにちは] [type:proper_noun, eng:Sosuke, jpn:そうすけ], do you [type:verb, eng:need, jpn:必要] [type:noun, eng:something, jpn:何か]?

lines.speaker: Sosuke
lines.text: I have some [type:noun, eng:questions, jpn:質問] for you.

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:kitchen, jpn:台所].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:kitchen, jpn:台所], [type:conjunction, eng:and then, jpn:そして] the [type:noun, eng:laundry room, jpn:洗濯室].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was in the [type:noun, eng:yard, jpn:庭].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:making breakfast, jpn:朝ごはんを作っていた] in the [type:noun, eng:morning, jpn:朝].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: [type:conjunction, eng:But, jpn:でも], in the [type:noun, eng:afternoon, jpn:午後] I was [type:phrase, eng:getting extra apples from the fridge, jpn:冷蔵庫から追加のリンゴを取っていた].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I didn’t have enough for the [type:noun, eng:raccoons, jpn:たぬき].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: [type:phrase, eng:Now that I think about it, jpn:今思えば]…

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I [type:phrase, eng:took your cake out of the fridge, jpn:ケーキを冷蔵庫から出した] and put it on the [type:noun, eng:counter, jpn:カウンター].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: [type:conjunction, eng:But, jpn:でも] I forgot about it because I was in a [type:noun, eng:hurry, jpn:急ぎ].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: When I came back, it was [type:adjective, eng:gone, jpn:なくなった]!

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I didn’t [type:verb, eng:eat, jpn:食べる] it, I [type:verb, eng:promise, jpn:約束する].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:making breakfast, jpn:朝ごはんを作っていた] in the [type:noun, eng:morning, jpn:朝], and [type:phrase, eng:cleaning up, jpn:片付けていた] in the [type:noun, eng:afternoon, jpn:午後].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:doing laundry, jpn:洗濯をしていた].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was in the [type:adjective, eng:secret, jpn:秘密の] room, making a [type:phrase, eng:deal with the raccoons, jpn:アライグマと取引していた].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: They bought [type:phrase, eng:3 barrels of apple juice, jpn:リンゴジュースを3樽], I barely had enough.

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:drying the laundry, jpn:洗濯物を干していた].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I was [type:phrase, eng:picking apples, jpn:リンゴを取っていた].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: It was [type:adjective, eng:peaceful, jpn:平和], no one else was outside.

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: [type:interjection, eng:No, jpn:いいえ] dear, I didn’t [type:verb, eng:eat, jpn:食べる] any of your [type:noun, eng:cake, jpn:ケーキ].

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I [type:verb, eng:forgot, jpn:忘れた] it on the [type:noun, eng:counter, jpn:カウンター], but I didn’t [type:verb, eng:eat, jpn:食べる] it.

lines.speaker: Karin
lines.text: I’ve been [type:verb, eng:trading, jpn:取引していた] [type:preposition, eng:with, jpn:と] [type:noun, eng:raccoons, jpn:たぬき].
